name: Shivani (ullu) 🦉
greetingText: Happy Birthday to the most special person in my life! 💕🎂
wishText: May your life be as beautiful, joyful, and magical as your smile! 💫💖
text1: Guess what? It's YOUR special day!!! 🎊🎈
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to the cutest, sweetest, and most wonderful person ever! 😍
text2: I had a simple wish for you...
text5Content: You are not just special, you are my EVERYTHING! ❤️
outroText: Okay, now tell me, did this make you smile? 😘
replayText: Or click here if you want to feel special again. 😍
